Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 35th overall pick, by Malibu in 1979...
Injured on 6/27/1986 with a Sore Knee, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had first career hit (double) on 6/21/1987, off Brandon Fuchs (BC)...
Injured on 6/25/1987 with a Hyper Extended Knee, out for 1-2 weeks...
Hit first career homerun on 7/31/1987, off Paul Mcfarlane (GHG)...
Traded from Malibu to New Jersey on 2/11/1988 (Going to NJ: CF P. Santana, P E. Witman. Going to Mal: 3B V. Green)...
Drove in 6 runs against Halifax on 5/15/1988...
Won Outstanding Newcomer Award in 1988, hitting .253 with 6 HR, 41 RBI...
Injured on 4/15/1990 with a Bruised Ribs, out for 1-2 weeks...
